targets.rawSql:
SELECT
	count(*)
FROM
	charging_processes
WHERE
	$__timeFilter(end_date)
	AND charge_energy_added > 0.01
	AND car_id = $car_id;

SELECT
	sum(charge_energy_added)
FROM
	charging_processes
WHERE
	$__timeFilter(end_date)
	AND car_id = $car_id;

WITH d AS (
	SELECT
		c.car_id,
		lag(end_[[preferred_range]]_range_km) OVER (ORDER BY start_date) - start_[[preferred_range]]_range_km AS range_loss,
		p.odometer - lag(p.odometer) OVER (ORDER BY start_date) AS distance
	FROM charging_processes c
	LEFT JOIN positions p ON p.id = c.position_id 
	WHERE
	  end_date IS NOT NULL AND
	  c.car_id = $car_id AND
	  $__timeFilter(start_date)
	ORDER BY start_date
),

range_loss_between_charges AS (
  SELECT sum(range_loss) AS range_loss
  FROM d
  WHERE distance >= 0 AND range_loss >= 0
  GROUP BY car_id
),

charge_dates AS (
	SELECT
		min(start_date) as first_charge,
		max(end_date) as last_charge
	FROM
		charging_processes
	WHERE
		end_date IS NOT NULL
		AND car_id = $car_id
		AND $__timeFilter(start_date)
),

range_loss_before_first_charge AS (
	SELECT
		max([[preferred_range]]_battery_range_km) - min([[preferred_range]]_battery_range_km) AS range_loss
	FROM positions, charge_dates
	WHERE
		car_id = $car_id
		AND $__timeFilter(date)
		AND ((select first_charge from charge_dates) is null OR date < (select first_charge from charge_dates))
),

range_loss_after_last_charge AS (
	SELECT
		max([[preferred_range]]_battery_range_km) - min([[preferred_range]]_battery_range_km) AS range_loss
	FROM positions, charge_dates
	WHERE
		car_id = $car_id
		AND $__timeFilter(date)
		AND date > (select last_charge from charge_dates)	
),

total_range_loss AS (
	SELECT range_loss FROM range_loss_between_charges
	UNION ALL
	SELECT range_loss FROM range_loss_before_first_charge
	UNION ALL
	SELECT range_loss FROM range_loss_after_last_charge
)

SELECT 'used' as metric, sum(range_loss * c.efficiency) AS value
FROM total_range_loss
LEFT JOIN cars c ON c.id = $car_id;

SELECT
	sum(cp.cost)
FROM
	charging_processes cp
LEFT JOIN 
	addresses addr ON addr.id = address_id
LEFT JOIN
  geofences geo ON geo.id = geofence_id
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(end_date)
  AND (addr.name ILIKE '%supercharger%' OR geo.name ILIKE '%supercharger%')
	AND cp.cost IS NOT NULL
	AND cp.car_id = $car_id;

SELECT
	sum(cost)
FROM
	charging_processes
WHERE
	$__timeFilter(end_date)
	AND car_id = $car_id;

SELECT (
  SELECT sum(cost)
  FROM charging_processes
  WHERE $__timeFilter(end_date) AND car_id = $car_id
) / (
  SELECT sum(greatest(charge_energy_added, charge_energy_used))
  FROM charging_processes
  WHERE $__timeFilter(end_date) AND car_id = $car_id
)

SELECT convert_km((max(odometer) - min(odometer))::numeric, '$length_unit') as "distance_$length_unit"
FROM positions
WHERE car_id = $car_id AND $__timeFilter(date)
ORDER BY 1;

SELECT
  sum(GREATEST(start_[[preferred_range]]_range_km - end_[[preferred_range]]_range_km, 0) * car.efficiency * 1000) / 
  convert_km(sum(distance)::numeric, '$length_unit') as "consumption_$length_unit"
FROM drives
JOIN cars car ON car.id = car_id
WHERE $__timeFilter(start_date) AND car_id = $car_id

WITH d AS (
	SELECT
		c.car_id,
		lag(end_[[preferred_range]]_range_km) OVER (ORDER BY start_date) - start_[[preferred_range]]_range_km AS range_loss,
		p.odometer - lag(p.odometer) OVER (ORDER BY start_date) AS distance
	FROM charging_processes c
	LEFT JOIN positions p ON p.id = c.position_id 
	WHERE
	  end_date IS NOT NULL AND
	  c.car_id = $car_id AND
	  $__timeFilter(start_date)
	ORDER BY start_date
),

range_loss_between_charges AS (
  SELECT sum(range_loss) AS range_loss
  FROM d
  WHERE distance >= 0 AND range_loss >= 0
  GROUP BY car_id
),

charge_dates AS (
	SELECT
		min(start_date) as first_charge,
		max(end_date) as last_charge
	FROM
		charging_processes
	WHERE
		car_id = $car_id
		AND $__timeFilter(start_date)
),

range_loss_before_first_charge AS (
	SELECT
		max([[preferred_range]]_battery_range_km) - min([[preferred_range]]_battery_range_km) AS range_loss
	FROM positions, charge_dates
	WHERE
		car_id = $car_id
		AND $__timeFilter(date)
		AND ((select first_charge from charge_dates) is null OR date < (select first_charge from charge_dates))
),

range_loss_after_last_charge AS (
	SELECT
		max([[preferred_range]]_battery_range_km) - min([[preferred_range]]_battery_range_km) AS range_loss
	FROM positions, charge_dates
	WHERE
		car_id = $car_id
		AND $__timeFilter(date)
		AND date > (select last_charge from charge_dates)	
),

total_range_loss AS (
  SELECT sum(range_loss) as range_loss
  FROM (
    SELECT range_loss FROM range_loss_between_charges
    UNION ALL
    SELECT range_loss FROM range_loss_before_first_charge
    UNION ALL
    SELECT range_loss FROM range_loss_after_last_charge
  ) r
),

distance AS (
  SELECT max(odometer) - min(odometer) as distance
  FROM positions
  WHERE car_id = $car_id AND $__timeFilter(date)
)

SELECT 
  NULLIF(range_loss, 0) * (c.efficiency * 1000) / convert_km(NULLIF(distance::numeric, 0), '$length_unit') as "consumption_$length_unit"
FROM total_range_loss, distance
LEFT JOIN cars c ON c.id = $car_id

SELECT (
  SELECT sum(cost)
  FROM charging_processes
  WHERE $__timeFilter(end_date) AND car_id = $car_id
) / (
	SELECT convert_km((max(odometer) - min(odometer))::numeric, '$length_unit')
	FROM positions
	WHERE $__timeFilter(date) AND car_id = $car_id
) * 100

WITH data AS (
  SELECT
		cp.id,
		cp.charge_energy_added,
		CASE WHEN NULLIF(mode() within group (order by charger_phases),0) is null THEN 'DC'
				 ELSE 'AC'
		END AS current
	FROM charging_processes cp
  RIGHT JOIN charges ON cp.id = charges.charging_process_id
  WHERE
	  cp.car_id = $car_id
	  AND cp.charge_energy_added > 0.01
	  AND $__timeFilter(start_date)
  GROUP BY 1,2
)
SELECT
	now() AS time,
	sum(charge_energy_added) AS value,
	current AS metric
FROM data
GROUP BY 3
ORDER BY metric DESC;

WITH charge_data AS (
SELECT COALESCE(geofence.name, CONCAT_WS(', ', COALESCE(address.name, nullif(CONCAT_WS(' ', address.road, address.house_number), '')), address.city)) AS loc_nm
, AVG(position.latitude) AS latitude
, AVG(position.longitude) AS longitude
, sum(charge.charge_energy_added) AS chg_total
, count(*) as charges
FROM charging_processes charge
LEFT JOIN addresses address ON charge.address_id = address.id
LEFT JOIN positions position ON charge.position_id = position.id
LEFT JOIN geofences geofence ON charge.geofence_id = geofence.id
WHERE $__timeFilter(charge.start_date) 
AND charge.car_id = $car_id
GROUP BY COALESCE(geofence.name, CONCAT_WS(', ', COALESCE(address.name, nullif(CONCAT_WS(' ', address.road, address.house_number), '')), address.city))
) 
SELECT loc_nm
	,latitude
	,longitude
	,chg_total
	,chg_total * 1.0 / (SELECT sum(chg_total) FROM charge_data) * 100   AS pct
	,charges
FROM charge_data

WITH data AS (
  SELECT
		cp.id,
		cp.duration_min,
		CASE WHEN NULLIF(mode() within group (order by charger_phases),0) is null THEN 'DC'
				 ELSE 'AC'
		END AS current
	FROM charging_processes cp
  RIGHT JOIN charges ON cp.id = charges.charging_process_id
  WHERE
	  cp.car_id = $car_id
	  AND cp.charge_energy_added > 0.01
	  AND $__timeFilter(start_date)
  GROUP BY 1,2
)
SELECT
	now() AS time,
	sum(duration_min) * 60 AS value,
	current AS metric
FROM data
GROUP BY 3
ORDER BY metric DESC;

WITH 
  distance AS (
    SELECT date_trunc('month', date, '$__timezone') as month, convert_km((max(odometer) - min(odometer))::numeric, '$length_unit') as "distance_$length_unit"
    FROM positions
    WHERE car_id = $car_id AND $__timeFilter(date)
    GROUP BY month
  ),
  
  net_consumption AS (
    SELECT
      date_trunc('month', start_date, '$__timezone') as month,
      sum(GREATEST(start_[[preferred_range]]_range_km - end_[[preferred_range]]_range_km, 0) * car.efficiency * 1000) / 
      convert_km(sum(distance)::numeric, '$length_unit') as "net_consumption_$length_unit"
    FROM drives
    JOIN cars car ON car.id = car_id
    WHERE $__timeFilter(start_date) AND car_id = $car_id
    GROUP BY month
  ),
  
  d AS (
	SELECT
    date_trunc('month', start_date, '$__timezone') as month,
		lag(end_[[preferred_range]]_range_km) OVER (ORDER BY start_date) - start_[[preferred_range]]_range_km AS range_loss,
		p.odometer - lag(p.odometer) OVER (ORDER BY start_date) AS distance
	FROM charging_processes c
	LEFT JOIN positions p ON p.id = c.position_id 
	WHERE
    end_date IS NOT NULL AND
    c.car_id = $car_id AND
    $__timeFilter(start_date)
	ORDER BY start_date
),

range_loss_between_charges AS (
  SELECT 
    month,
    sum(range_loss) AS range_loss
  FROM d
  WHERE 
    distance >= 0 AND 
    range_loss >= 0
  GROUP BY month
),

charge_dates AS (
	SELECT
    date_trunc('month', start_date, '$__timezone') as month,
		min(start_date) as first_charge,
		max(end_date) as last_charge
	FROM
		charging_processes
	WHERE
		car_id = $car_id
		AND $__timeFilter(start_date)
  GROUP BY month
),

range_loss_before_first_charge AS (
	SELECT
    month,
		max([[preferred_range]]_battery_range_km) - min([[preferred_range]]_battery_range_km) AS range_loss
	FROM positions, charge_dates
	WHERE
		car_id = $car_id
    AND month = date_trunc('month', date, '$__timezone')
		AND $__timeFilter(date)
		AND (first_charge is null OR date < first_charge)
  GROUP BY month
),

range_loss_after_last_charge AS (
	SELECT
    month,
		max([[preferred_range]]_battery_range_km) - min([[preferred_range]]_battery_range_km) AS range_loss
	FROM positions, charge_dates
	WHERE
		car_id = $car_id
    AND month = date_trunc('month', date, '$__timezone')
		AND $__timeFilter(date)
		AND date > last_charge
  GROUP BY month
),

total_range_loss AS (
  SELECT 
    month,
    sum(range_loss) as range_loss
  FROM (
    SELECT month, range_loss FROM range_loss_between_charges
    UNION ALL
    SELECT month, range_loss FROM range_loss_before_first_charge
    UNION ALL
    SELECT month, range_loss FROM range_loss_after_last_charge
  ) r
  GROUP BY month
),

gross_consumption AS (
  SELECT 
    distance.month,
    NULLIF(range_loss, 0) * (c.efficiency * 1000) / distance_$length_unit as "gross_consumption_$length_unit"
  FROM total_range_loss, distance
  LEFT JOIN cars c ON c.id = $car_id
  WHERE total_range_loss.month = distance.month
)

SELECT
  distance.month as month,
  distance_$length_unit,
  net_consumption_$length_unit,
  gross_consumption_$length_unit
FROM distance
LEFT JOIN net_consumption ON net_consumption.month = distance.month
LEFT JOIN gross_consumption ON gross_consumption.month = distance.month
ORDER BY month;

WITH 
  preferred_geofences AS (
    SELECT
        id,
        name
    FROM
        geofences
    WHERE
        id IN ($geo_fences)
  ),
  charge_mode AS (
    SELECT
        charging_process_id,
        CASE WHEN NULLIF(mode() within group (order by charger_phases),0) is null THEN 'DC' ELSE 'AC' END AS current
    FROM
        charges
    GROUP BY
        charging_process_id
  ),
  data AS (
      SELECT
          date_trunc('month', start_date, '$__timezone') AS month,
          (round(extract(epoch FROM start_date) - 10) * 1000) AS start_date_ts,
          (round(extract(epoch FROM end_date) + 10) * 1000) AS end_date_ts,
          start_date,
          current,
          end_date,
          CONCAT_WS(', ', COALESCE(addresses.name, CONCAT_WS(' ', addresses.road, addresses.house_number)), addresses.city) AS address,
          COALESCE(g.name, CONCAT_WS(', ', COALESCE(addresses.name, CONCAT_WS(' ', addresses.road, addresses.house_number)), addresses.city)) as location,
          COALESCE(pg.name, 'Other') as preferred_location,
          g.name as geofence_name,
          g.id as geofence_id,
          p.latitude,
          p.longitude,
          c.charge_energy_added,
          c.charge_energy_used,
          duration_min,
          start_battery_level,
          end_battery_level,
          start_[[preferred_range]]_range_km,
          end_[[preferred_range]]_range_km,
          outside_temp_avg,
          c.id,
          lag(end_[[preferred_range]]_range_km) OVER (ORDER BY start_date) - start_[[preferred_range]]_range_km AS range_loss,
          p.odometer - lag(p.odometer) OVER (ORDER BY start_date) AS distance,
          cars.efficiency,
          c.car_id,
          cost
      FROM
          charging_processes c
      LEFT JOIN positions p ON p.id = c.position_id
      LEFT JOIN cars ON cars.id = c.car_id
      LEFT JOIN addresses ON addresses.id = c.address_id
      LEFT JOIN geofences g ON g.id = geofence_id
      LEFT JOIN preferred_geofences pg ON pg.id = geofence_id
      LEFT JOIN charge_mode cm ON cm.charging_process_id = c.id
  WHERE 
      (c.charge_energy_added IS NULL OR c.charge_energy_added > 0) AND
      c.car_id = $car_id AND
      $__timeFilter(start_date)
  )

SELECT
    car_id,
    -- Columns
    month,
    preferred_location as address,   
    current,
    count(*) as count, 
    sum(duration_min) as duration_min,
    sum(cost) as cost,
    sum(charge_energy_added) as charge_energy_added,
    sum(charge_energy_used) as charge_energy_used,
    sum(charge_energy_added) * 60 / NULLIF (sum(duration_min), 0) AS charge_energy_added_per_hour,
    min(start_battery_level) as min_start_battery_level,
    max(end_battery_level) as max_end_battery_level,
    sum(convert_km(distance::numeric, '$length_unit')) AS distance_$length_unit
 FROM
    data
WHERE
    (distance >= 0 OR distance IS NULL)
GROUP BY
    month, car_id, preferred_location, current
ORDER BY
    month DESC, car_id, preferred_location;

list.definition: SELECT name AS __text, id AS __value FROM cars ORDER BY display_priority ASC, name ASC;
list.label: Car
list.name: car_id
list.query: SELECT name AS __text, id AS __value FROM cars ORDER BY display_priority ASC, name ASC;

list.definition:
with last_drives as (select start_date from drives order by start_date desc limit 3)
select extract(epoch from min(start_date)) * 1000 from last_drives;
list.name: from
list.query:
with last_drives as (select start_date from drives order by start_date desc limit 3)
select extract(epoch from min(start_date)) * 1000 from last_drives;

list.definition:
SELECT
        g.id as __value,
        g.name as __text
    FROM
        charging_processes c
    JOIN geofences g ON g.id = geofence_id
WHERE 
    (charge_energy_added IS NULL OR charge_energy_added > 0) AND
    c.car_id = $car_id AND
    $__timeFilter(start_date)
GROUP BY
    g.id, g.name
ORDER BY
    count(*) DESC
list.label: Distinct localtions
list.name: geo_fences
list.query:
SELECT
        g.id as __value,
        g.name as __text
    FROM
        charging_processes c
    JOIN geofences g ON g.id = geofence_id
WHERE 
    (charge_energy_added IS NULL OR charge_energy_added > 0) AND
    c.car_id = $car_id AND
    $__timeFilter(start_date)
GROUP BY
    g.id, g.name
ORDER BY
    count(*) DESC
